bean.pwr.imskamieskiego.repository

Interface MapRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapRepositoryImpl

    public interface MapRepository
    This interface represents repository of data related to map and navigation graph.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getLocationByID(int id)
      Returns location represented by the given ID.
      MapPoint getNearestPoint(int x, int y, int floor)
      Returns the point on the map which is nearest to given coordinates on specified floor.
      java.util.List<Edge> getOutgoingEdges(int pointID)
      Returns all edges, which start from point with given ID
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Edge>> getOutgoingEdges(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pointID)
      Returns a list of all edges for all points in the list.
      MapPoint getPointByID(int id)
      Returns the point on the map represented by the given ID.
      java.util.List<MapPoint> getPointByID(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> id)
      Returns the list of point on the map represented by the given ID list.
      java.util.List<MapPoint> getPointsByLocationID(int id)
      Returns list of points on map associated with location.

    • Method Detail

      • getPointByID

        MapPoint getPointByID(int id)
        Returns the point on the map represented by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - id of point
        Returns:
        MapPoint object. Can be null, when object for passed ID does not exist.

      • getPointByID

        java.util.List<MapPoint> getPointByID(@NonNull
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> id)
                               throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Returns the list of point on the map represented by the given ID list.
        Parameters:
        id - list of point's ID
        Returns:
        List of MapPoint. Can be empty, when IDs don't match to any point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • getNearestPoint

        MapPoint getNearestPoint(int x,
                         int y,
                         int floor)
        Returns the point on the map which is nearest to given coordinates on specified floor. Points from other floors are omit.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate on the map
        y - coordinate on the map
        floor - floor on which points will be searched
        Returns:
        MapPoint object. Can be null, when specified floor haven't any point.

      • getPointsByLocationID

        java.util.List<MapPoint> getPointsByLocationID(int id)
        Returns list of points on map associated with location.
        Parameters:
        id - location ID
        Returns:
        return list of MapPoint. List can be empty if location hasn't any associated point.

      • getLocationByID

        Location getLocationByID(int id)
        Returns location represented by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of location
        Returns:
        Location object. Cab be null when object for passed ID not exist.

      • getOutgoingEdges

        java.util.List<Edge> getOutgoingEdges(int pointID)
        Returns all edges, which start from point with given ID
        Parameters:
        pointID - ID of point
        Returns:
        List of edges. If point with given ID hasn't any edge, return empty list.

      • getOutgoingEdges

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Edge>> getOutgoingEdges(@NonNull
                                                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pointID)
                                                                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Returns a list of all edges for all points in the list. If the point with the given ID does not exist, it will not be added to the result map. If all the points in the list do not exist, the map will be empty.
        Parameters:
        pointID - list of point IDs
        Returns:
        Map where key is point ID and value is list of edges for this ID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException
